components/sbthemes/module/sb_listing_ta:
{{!-- Arguments: - moduleId (number): section instance index number - class_sfx (string): Use for CSS class styling suffix --}} {{#if status }}
{{> components/sbthemes/module/sb_listing_tabs/default_tabs category_id=(lang (concat (concat 'sb_themes.sb_listing_tabs.category_' moduleId) '.id')) style=(concat 'instance' index) banner=(lang (concat (concat 'sb_themes.sb_listing_tabs.category_' moduleId) '.image')) placeholder=(lang (concat (concat 'sb_themes.sb_listing_tabs.category_' moduleId) '.placeholderImage')) url=(lang (concat (concat 'sb_themes.sb_listing_tabs.category_' moduleId) '.url')) alignBanner = banner columns= columns }}
{{/if}}
